@wangkenpu I see. You have a valid point. I'm reopening this to see if anyone wants to discuss per-input dim arg for DataParallel.

I am wondering if you are just doing one recurrent cell in each forward? If that's the case, do you really need multi-GPU? If each forward is an entire sequence, how about initializing hidden in forward (or use default hidden that is init'ed to zero if you are using the provided RNN layers)?

@wangkenpu I see. You have a valid point. I'm reopening this to see if anyone wants to discuss per-input `dim` arg for `DataParallel`.

I am wondering if you are just doing one recurrent cell in each forward? If that's the case, do you really need multi-GPU? If each forward is an entire sequence, how about initializing `hidden` in forward (or use default `hidden` that is init'ed to zero if you are using the provided RNN layers)?
